text:
Created attachment 35045
Screen shot of HTTP(S) Test Script Recorder

My Java Version is 1.8.0_131
My windows version is Windows 10 Version 1703 (OS Build 15063.332)

My problem is that the Port field in HTTP(S) Test Script Recorder seems compressed and I am unable to key in any value - see attachment.

I tried reinstalling but I still have the same problem.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 60995 ***
